templates.name: Select a template or write your own
Check Order Status
templates.content:
Hello,

I would like to check the status of my order #12345. Could you please provide me with an update?

Thank you,
[Your Name]

templates.name: Return Request
templates.content:
Dear Support Team,

I need to return an item from my recent order. Can you please help me with the return process?

Order Number: [Order Number]
Item to Return: [Item Name/SKU]
Reason for Return: [Your Reason]

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

templates.name: Product Inquiry
templates.content:
Hello,

I have a question about the product [Product Name]. Can you provide more information about its [specific feature or specification]?

Also, is this product currently in stock?

Thank you for your help.

Best,
[Your Name]
